example.eg: The children are learning to count.
She counted the candies.
The teacher counted up the scripts she had collected at the end of the exam.
example.egtrans: 老师算出了自己在考试结束后收到的试卷总数。

example.eg: The tour guide counted up the tourists as they got back on the bus.
example.egtrans: 游客们回到车上后，导游数出了人头总数。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 算出…的总数，数出…的总数

example.eg: Are you done? What's the total count?  All the patients showed an increase in their white cell counts.
example.egtrans: 你做完了吗？总数是多少？所有病人的白细胞总数都有增加。

example.eg: He was down for the count.
example.egtrans: 他被打倒在地，数秒完毕后还是没能站起来。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 裁判对被打倒的选手数十秒（给予拳击手再次站起来比赛的宽限时间）

example.eg: He was charged for 3 counts of assault.
example.egtrans: 他以三项攻击罪名被起诉。

example.eg: The counts are in and the Democrats have won.
Don Juan was the Count of Barcelona.
Does my work experience count?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有重要性, 有大意义

example.eg: Your honesty counts a lot to me.
example.egtrans: 你的诚实对我来说意义非凡。

example.eg: It's an eight-hour drive, not counting any stops.
I count you among my best friends.
I should like to thank you for your help, and assure you that you may count upon my support at any time.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 血球计数, 血细胞计数

example.eg: After the earthquake, the body count rose to the thousands.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 全血细胞计数, 血常规

example.eg: His criminal record will count against him when he starts applying for jobs.
I'd love to go camping with you. Count me in!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 算我一个, 加我一个

example.eg: Count me out! There's no way I can afford to eat there.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 别把我算在内，除了我，把我除外

example.eg: One of the best ways to fall asleep is to count sheep.
example.egtrans: 催眠最好的方式之一就是数绵羊。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 数绵羊, 以数羊的方法入睡

example.eg: I can count up to ten in Chinese.

dsense.name: count your chickens, count your chickens before they are hatched

trans_examp.trans_cn: 过早下定论, 打如意算盘

example.eg: Abigail paused for a count of three before telling her husband why she was angry.
The teacher did a quick head count before dividing the class into two groups.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 计数, 人数统计, 点人数
不中用的人，无价值的人

example.eg: The race will start on the count of three.

dsense.name: down for the count (US), out for the count (UK)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 被击倒读秒的, 被打晕的

dsense.name: down for the count (US), out for the count (UK)

example.eg: He's out for the count.
Ballots were recounted but the result was the same.
Opposition candidates are demanding a recount.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 重数, 重新计数, 重新清点

example.eg: Expensive sheets and pillowcases usually have a very high thread count.
Write the word count at the end of your essay.
